tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bug_reports (
    bug_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bug_description TEXT,
    bug_status VARCHAR(50),
    reported_by_user_id UUID,
    reported_at TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE bug_reports (
 bug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 bug_description TEXT,
 bug_status VARCHAR(50),
 reported_by VARCHAR(100),
 reported_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
 feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 feedback_text TEXT,
 feedback_rating INT,
 submitted_by VARCHAR(100),
 submitted_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE BugReports (bug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bug_description TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(50),
  reported_on TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'New');

CREATE TABLE PlayerFeedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50),
  feedback TEXT,
  submitted_on TIMESTAMP,
  rating INT);

CREATE TABLE GameQualityMetrics (metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  value DECIMAL(10,2),
  recorded_on TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE bug_reports (
  bug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bug_description TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(50),
  date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_description TEXT,
  player_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE bug_status (
  bug_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  resolved_by VARCHAR(50),
  resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_data (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50),
  player_level INT,
  player_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE bug_reports (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    submitted_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE game_stats (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    total_players INT,
    average_rating FLOAT,
    total_bugs_found INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE feature_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    submitted_by UUID
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    display_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    join_date TIMESTAMP
)
